tool_description: Performs comprehensive audits of price consistency across channels, identifying discrepancies and generating compliance reports.

audit_scope.description: Audit scope: full_inventory, sample_based, or targeted

sample_size.description: Number of products to sample (for sample_based audit)

target_products.description: Specific products to audit (for targeted audit)

channels_to_audit.description: Sales channels to include in the audit

error_messages: Invalid audit scope: Use full_inventory, sample_based, or targeted.
Missing target products: targeted audit requires target_products parameter.
Invalid sample size: sample_size must be greater than 0 for sample_based audit.
Empty channel list: channels_to_audit cannot be empty.
Invalid tolerance: tolerance_threshold must be non-negative.
usage: Select audit_scope and specify channels_to_audit. Configure additional parameters based on your chosen audit scope for comprehensive consistency checking.
